price: A kad im se kazuje, govore: “Mi vjerujemo u njega, on je istina od Gospodara našeg, mi smo i prije bili muslimani.”
arabic: وَإِذَا يُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡهِمۡ قَالُوٓاْ ءَامَنَّا بِهِۦٓ إِنَّهُ ٱلۡحَقُّ مِن رَّبِّنَآ إِنَّا كُنَّا مِن قَبۡلِهِۦ مُسۡلِمِينَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā yut'lā ʿalayhim qālū āmannā bihi innahu al-ḥaqu min rabbinā innā kunnā min qablihi mus'limīna
